Our Story: Building a Connected Africa from Ethiopia

Addis Cable Manufacturing PLC traces its origins back to August 2011, when the factory was first established as a national investment project to support Ethiopia's growing demand for reliable electrical infrastructure materials.

Production began in late 2017 and operated intermittently until mid-2024, when the company was officially acquired and revitalized under Ato Chombe Seyoum. The company was restructured and rebranded as Chombe Seyoum Electrical Product Manufacturing (CSEPM)—ushering in a new era of excellence, innovation, and industrial expansion.

Today, Addis Cable is preparing for a full-scale production restart for the 2025/26 manufacturing year, equipped with new leadership, modern machinery upgrades, and a strengthened market vision.

Our Mission

To empower Ethiopia, East Africa, and the wider African continent with high-quality, innovative, and affordable cable solutions that accelerate industrialization, electrification, and sustainable development.

Our Vision

To become Africa's most trusted and technologically advanced cable manufacturer, recognized for engineering excellence, product reliability, and regional leadership in energy connectivity.

Our Promise

"Wired for Excellence" reflects our commitment to craftsmanship, innovation, and integrity in every meter of cable we produce.

Our Factory & Production Capacity

State-of-the-art manufacturing excellence in the heart of Ethiopia

State-of-the-Art Manufacturing

Addis Cable operates one of Ethiopia's most sophisticated cable manufacturing facilities, utilizing modern European and Asian technology for precision production.

  • Copper and aluminum rod breakdown
  • Wire drawing
  • Stranding and bunching
  • Extrusion (PVC/XLPE)
  • Armoring and sheathing
  • Enamelling and chemical coating
  • Real-time quality control and testing

Addis Cable is one of the only factories in Ethiopia capable of producing enamelled winding wires for industrial motors, generators, and transformers.

Engineered for Africa's Power Infrastructure

Our complete portfolio delivers reliable, high-performance cables designed to withstand Ethiopia's diverse climates—from highland regions to humid lowlands.

Up to 1 kV

Low Voltage Cables

PVC insulated & sheathed cables for residential, commercial, and light industrial applications.

IEC 60227 | ES Standards
3.8 kV - 33 kV

Medium Voltage Cables

XLPE insulation for urban networks, industrial plants, and renewable energy installations.

IEC 60502-2
Above 33 kV

High Voltage Cables

Steel wire armored cables with metallic screening for transmission lines and substations.

IEC 60840 | Fully Type-Tested
AAC, ACSR, AAAC

Conductors & ABC

High tensile strength, corrosion & UV resistant conductors for overhead power distribution.

IEC 61089 | ASTM B232

Specialty: Enamelled Winding Wires

Unique capability in Ethiopia. Thermal classes 130L-200+°C for motors, generators, and transformers.
